title: All of you should be in 'low priority queue' permanently.
body: Because that's what you are, low priority.

replies.body: Can we please ban this guy riot, he is negative towards everything, thinks he is better than everyone else as well, that **is** the impression this guy gives me

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=axYGjcMm,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-18T02:36:30.474+0000)
>
> Can we please ban this guy riot, he is negative towards everything, thinks he is better than everyone else as well, that **is** the impression this guy gives me

Riot doesn't ban famous people, and I am famous therefor I will not be banned.
how are you famous, your just negative and somewhat toxic, using a game thingies name. Most people I know don't even **know** what sackboy is

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=axYGjcMm,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-03-18T02:59:00.190+0000)
>
> how are you famous, your just negative and somewhat toxic, using a game thingies name. Most people I know don't even **know** what sackboy is

That's because this one of my many accounts ;)

Boards famous

So like 20 people know you?

can u just like gtfo
stupid bait trash
my god ppl are actually taking this seriously.... >____>

> [{quoted}](name=MageBlades,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=axYGjcMm,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-03-18T04:51:49.537+0000)
>

Of course they are, maybe now you understand why I get such a kick out of it.
It cracks me up how upset people get.

> [{quoted}](name=Sackboy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=axYGjcMm,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-03-18T07:15:16.488+0000)
>
> Of course they are, maybe now you understand why I get such a kick out of it.
> It cracks me up how upset people get.

Now I see...I fully understand now...

But I dunno man, I still feel like acting myself on the Boards and not 'having fun' in such way like you are...

I'll still be honest to myself to matter what threat...so my honest opinion about you is that man, you will down your own reputation just for the fun of it aye? Well, I guess it's not that important...is its the internet after all :)


Man I feel somewhat dumb for taking you seriously back a while ago.....
I guess you learn from experience :P
(but dude wtf I've been on the OCE Boards/Forums since the beginning of OCE [and a bit from NA]...I haven't learnt until now...)

> [{quoted}](name=MageBlades,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=axYGjcMm,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-03-18T08:30:20.853+0000)

I'm like this in irl too, just not trolley, I'll speak my mind, idc about your feelings, lol.
I killed my reputation years ago buddy, I'm just bored so I troll around, soon enough you'll learn when I'm serious and when I'm trolling, because not everything is trolling. Despite it I am very talented at the game, lol.

People figured me out on NA, so I moved here when it opened.
If we're low priority, i'd consider you "just trash".
